turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Inspired by Hyder's encouragement as well as a viewing of the IMAX film "", van Vuuren committed himself to making his film in large format.

turn.8: Van Vuuren spent the next three years doing numerous rewrites and reworks of his film.

turn.12: An avid fan of the film "", directed by Stanley Kubrick, van Vuuren finally found his moment of clarity during his annual viewing of that movie in 2009. "There are only 11 minutes of dialog in "2001's" 140 minutes," van Vuuren told "LF Examiner" in 2012.
